# AllPeptides.psmtsv file
`AllPeptides.psmtsv` contains a \code{data.frame} with ... .

Below is the script used to create the `AllPeptides.psmtsv` file.
[Codice MM]

```r
### read AllPeptides.psmtsv file returned by MM
# data_path = "/path/to/AllPeptides.psmtsv"
df = data.table::fread(data_path)
# Keep usefull columns for our model:
df = df[, c("Base Sequence", "Decoy/Contaminant/Target", "PSM Count (unambiguous, <0.01 q-value)", "Protein Accession", "QValue", "PEP")]
data.table::fwrite(df, "AllPeptides.psmtsv")
```
